org.openntf.domino.ext

Interface ViewEntry

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ViewEntry
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ViewEntry

    public interface ViewEntry
    Author:
    withersp OpenNTF extensions to ViewEntry class

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object getColumnValue(String columnName)
      Gets a specific column's value, preferable to using getColumnValues()
      <T> T getColumnValue(String columnName, Class<?> T)
      Gets a column value by programmatic column name, casting the return value to a specific Java class, e.g.
      Collection<Object> getColumnValuesEx()
      Gets the column values as an unmodifiable collection, useful for caching
      Map<String,Object> getColumnValuesMap()
      Gets a Map of column values, where the key is the programmatic name of the column, the value is the relevant column values for the ViewEntry
      View getParentView()
      Gets the View the ViewEntry is a child of
      String getPosition()
      Gets the position of the entry with each level of the hierarchy separated by a '.'

        Returns:
        Object representing the value for that column
